English: You seem to still have it.
Chinese: 看來你還挺有兩下子的。
Korean: …꽤 하는 것 같네
German: Du hast doch noch nachgesetzt.

English: Ha. You too.
Chinese: 哼，你也是啊！
Korean: 헷, 너도
German: Ha, du genauso.

English:
I thought you old-school hackers wouldn't know how
to use Digimon programs.
Chinese:
以你這種舊型的駭客來說，
算是非常會使用數碼寶貝程式了。
Korean:
너 같은 구 타입의 해커는
디지몬 프로그램을 다루지 못 할 거라고 생각하고 있었어
German:
Ich dachte, ihr Hacker der alten Schule wüsstet
nicht, wie man Digimon-Programme benutzt.

English: We've got a geek-class specialist in Digimon work.
Chinese:
我認識一個在數碼寶貝方面，
可說是「科技鬼才」級別的專家…
Korean: 특히, 디지몬에 관해서 "괴짜" 클래스인 전문가가 있어서 말이지
German: Wir haben einen Obergeek speziell dafür.

English: It's very important to have... well, you know.
Chinese: 這就是所謂的「出外靠朋友」了。
Korean: 가져야 할 것은… 이라는 거다
German: Man braucht unbedingt ... Na, du weißt schon.

English: We also have a real pain-in-the-butt.
Chinese: 而且還有個非常煩人的傢伙。
Korean: …그리고, 툭하면 시끄러운 녀석도 있고 말이야
German: Wir haben außerdem eine richtige Nervensäge.

English:
As I said, Digimon are not programs!
How many times do I have to tell you?!
Chinese:
所以說，數碼寶貝不是程式！
要我說幾遍你們才懂！
Korean:
…그러니까, 디지몬은 프로그램 같은 게 아니라구!
몇 번을 설명해야 알아듣는 거야!
German:
Ich sage doch, Digimon sind keine Programme!
Wie oft muss ich mich noch wiederholen?!

English:
It don't matter. We ain't interested.
I only care about one thing, and that's Yuugo.
Chinese:
這種事……不管妳說幾遍我都沒興趣！
我有興趣的只有一個，那就是YUGO大人。
Korean:
그런 거, 몇 번을 설명해도 흥미가 안 생깁니다
내의 흥미는 단 하나… 유고 씨 뿐이니까요
German:
Das ist egal und interessiert uns nicht.
Mich interessiert nur Yuugo.

English:
Yuugo is my everything.
To know Yuugo... to protect Yuugo...
Chinese:
YUGO才是我的一切……
了解YUGO、保護YUGO……
Korean:
유고야말로, 내의 전부…
유고를 아는 것, 유고를 지키는 것…
German:
Yuugo ist mein Ein und Alles.
Yuugo zu verstehen ... und zu beschützen ...

English:
That is my purpose in life.
All I want is Yuugo. Just her...
Chinese:
這才是我的使命，
我想要的只有YUGO大人……只有那女孩……
Korean:
그게 내 목숨의 사용법입니다
내가 원하는 건 유고 씨, 그녀 뿐입니다…
German:
Das ist meine Bestimmung im Leben.
Ich brauche nur Yuugo. Nichts außer ihr ...

English:
Wow, I didn't know you COULD be sincere! In spite 
of your gross personality, that was kinda sweet!
Chinese:
沒想到妳還挺專情的耶……雖然我很討厭妳的個性，
可是剛才差點心動……
Korean:
의, 의외로 일편단심이구나…! 성격은 마음에 안 드는데
나도 모르게 두근거릴 뻔 했잖아…!
German:
Ich wusste gar nicht, dass du auch aufrichtig sein
kannst. Du bist zwar ein Ekel, aber das war
irgendwie anrührend!

English: Wait a second. "Her"?
Chinese: 嗯？“那女孩”……？
German: Moment mal. „Ihr“?

English:
...
I just noticed something.
Chinese:
……
我剛剛發現了一件事。
Korean:
……
…지금 하나, 깨달은 게 있습니다
German:
...
Mir fällt gerade etwas auf.

English: You and me are a lot alike.
Chinese: 我跟妳似乎有點像呢！
Korean: 나와 당신, 꽤나 닮은 것 같군요
German: Wir sind uns sehr ähnlich.

English:
What? Hang--hang on! What are you talking about?
Kn-Knock it off with that nonsense!
Chinese:
嗯？等、等一下，妳幹嘛突然說這種話？
不、不要說這種話啦！
Korean:
…에? 자, 잠깐 뭐야 갑자기!
그, 그만해, 그런 말은…
German:
Wie? Moment, Moooment mal! Was redest du da?
H-Hör auf mit dem Unfug!

English: Great minds hate alike.
Chinese: 這就是所謂的同性相斥吧！
Korean: 동족혐오, 라는 걸까요
German: Große Geister hassen gleich.

English: What?! What do you mean by that?
Chinese: 咦？同性相斥？
Korean: 에!? 동족혐오?
German: Was?! Was soll das denn heißen?

English: That's enough chitchat.
Chinese: 聊天就到此為止了。
Korean: …잡담은 끝입니다
German: Genug geplaudert.

English:
I doubt you're much different from before.
I'll tan your hide! Ready?
Chinese:
不過我認為就算打起來，和上次也不會有什麼差別，
我會一口氣解決妳的，做好心理準備了嗎？
Korean:
뭐, 저번과 크게 다를 거라고는 생각하지 않지만요
단숨에 납작하게 만들어 주겠습니다, 각오하시지요!
German:
Ich glaube nicht, dass ich mehr von dir erwarten
muss. Dir ziehe ich das Fell über die Ohren!
Bereit?

English:
I took a crash course and beefed up my skills!
It won't go down as easily as last time!
Chinese:
我可是經過特訓，加深了羈絆，力量也變得更強！
可不像之前那樣，那麼容易對付！
Korean:
…특훈해서 인연을 돈독히 하고, 힘을 길렀는걸!
저번처럼 쉽게 당하지는 않을 거야!
German:
Ich hab einen Schnellkurs gemacht und viel
dazugelernt! So einfach wie letztes Mal wird es
nicht!

English:
So you say.
I'll mess y'all up!
Chinese:
那就……
讓我好好地享受一番吧！！
Korean:
그렇다면…
부디 내를 즐겁게 해 주시지요!!
German:
Das denkst du.
Euch mache ich zur Schnecke!
